name: TURN (itch) (steepcrane)
description:
wait your turn...

 in TURN

 controls arrow keys/swipes to move space/click to pass a turn don't end a turn on the same space as an enemy!

 inspired by retro NES games (in palette and difficulty!)

  updates ▒ version 1.0 game released ▒ version 1.1/1.2 score system bugfixes 

 ▓ version 2.0 mobile support overhauled control system adjusted score display high score support enemy spawning/interactions fixes secrets (press 7 on the title)
